Content.Text:
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good! I'm glad we didn't miss each other
along the way. I was just on my way to see you!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Why? To ask you out on a date, of course! Why
else?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you have other plans, I won't intrude. But if
you don't, would you care to join me for dinner?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I thought you might say that. Come on, let's go.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Goodness, you certainly seem to be enjoying
that!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Simply watching you is enough for me to feel as
if I've had a full meal myself.
Well, it's really good!
Well, I'm with you...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I can see that. However, I'm not sure what I
think of the meal itself being prioritized over our
conversation!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You do have the most adorable expression on
your face when enjoying things you like, though.
And that is quite pleasant to watch.
<PAGE>
But I would enjoy it much more if that smile
were directed at me, rather than the dish.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee. I'm glad you understand! I hope you
will be more conscientious of that in the future.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Being with me makes the meal taste better to
you? Goodness, you say the most adorable
things!
<PAGE>
If that's the case, then I suppose I HAVE to
forgive you for being so absorbed in your meal!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You hadn't noticed? Since the food arrived,
you've paid far more attention to it than to me.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
No, it's all right! From what you said a moment
ago, I'm sure you hadn't forgotten me. You still
felt my presence, which is sweet!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Though I must admit, it isn't very pleasant to feel
so ignored for so long. Please try to be a bit
more cognizant of that, if you would.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
For some reason, I feel like I've just been
effectively cajoled into doing what you want.
But the truth is, I'm not entirely certain I mind!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...N-never mind. I said nothing!
...Anyway, you have a smear of ketchup on your
cheek.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Sheesh. You are such a handful.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here, I'll wipe it off for you. Hold still...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hrm. You know, this might be the perfect
opportunity...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Pardon me.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
There, it's all cleaned off. I'm sorry, but I forgot
my handkerchief today, you see.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
At any rate, since we've finished our meals, we
should probably be on our way. Let me see you
home.
<PAGE>
I did invite you to this with little warning, after
all. And you're a very busy person. I'm sure you
have much to do.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee. Well, I did offer to see her home!
Always in such a hurry, she is...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Could I ask you not to show off so much in my
restaurant, please? There's no way you forgot
your trusty hanky.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
My apologies. I simply thought it might be a
good opportunity to discourage
any...onlookers...from looking on.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Okay, but don't mess her around too much. She
deserves better.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>If anyone is being led around by the nose, it's
me.
<PAGE>
It feels like, no matter how carefully I plan my
actions, I am constantly done in by her innocent
spontaneity. And she has no idea she's doing it!
<PAGE>
Why, just a few minutes ago...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>Erm, nothing. Thank you for the delicious meal.
I should be going now.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm. So both of them are taking advantage of
the other, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Still, you don't get that natural of an expression
out of Mistel so easily. He really should show it
to <MYNAME> a bit more often...
